title: Give Access to Co-Instructors & TAs: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: The Course Reserves tool is accessible to any Instructor, Co-Instructor or Teaching Assistant (TA) enrolled in the Canvas course site. All Instructors, Co-Instructors and TA's enrolled in a Canvas course site will be able to: To grant others permission to administer the Course Reserves tool, they must first be enrolled in your Canvas course site and assigned the proper role (for example, TA).  See instructions.
